##random_list Discipline and Trait generation by Preacher
###Start up character creation
namespace = TOSDTG

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.1

	
	hide_window = yes
	
	trigger = {
		min_age = 16
		OR = {
			culture_group = north_germanic
			culture_group = central_germanic
			culture_group = west_germanic
			culture_group = latin
			culture_group = dalmatian
			culture_group = byzantine
			culture_group = celtic
			culture_group = finno_ugric
			culture_group = baltic
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = arabic
			culture_group = levantine_arabic
			culture_group = east_slavic
			culture_group = west_slavic
			culture_group = south_slavic
			culture_group = magyar
			culture_group = iranian
			culture_group = east_african
			culture_group = west_african
			culture_group = mesoamerican
			culture_group = israelite
			culture_group = indo_aryan_group
			culture_group = dravidian_group
			culture_group = vasconic
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = character_creation }
	}
	
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
		
	character_event = { id = TOSDTG.2 }
	
	set_character_flag = character_creation
		
	}
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.2 
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { which = discipine value = 1 }
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				}
				30 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 2 }
				}
				15 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 3 }
				}
				5 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 4 }
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.3 }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }	
	
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
	
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.3
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 1 }
			}
			create_character = {
				random_traits = no 
				dynasty =  random_list
				culture =  ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				
			}
			new_character = {
				set_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
			}
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 2 }
			}
			create_character = {
				random_traits = no
				dynasty =  random_list
				culture =  ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				
			}
			new_character = {
				set_variable = { which = traits value = 2 }
			}
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 3 } 
			}
			create_character = {
				random_traits = no
				dynasty =  random_list
				culture =  ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				
			}
			new_character = {
				set_variable = { which = traits value = 3 }
			}
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 4 } 
			}
			create_character = {
				random_traits = no
				dynasty =  random_list
				culture =  ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				
			}
			new_character = {
				set_variable = { which = traits value = 4 }
			}
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.4 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.4
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 4 }
		
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.5 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.6 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.7 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.8 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.9 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.10 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.11 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.12 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.13 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.14 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.15 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.16 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.17 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.18 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.19 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.20 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.21 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.5
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = athletics_I
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = athletics_II
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}				
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.22 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = athletics_III
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.23 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = athletics_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.25 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.6
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_I
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_II
					trait = weapon_arts_III 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_II
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_III 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.27 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_III
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_II 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.31 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_II 
					trait = weapon_arts_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.36 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.14
	
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {

					trait = animal_handling_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

	}

	id = TOSDTG.27
	
	hide_window = yes 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.28 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.29 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.30 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.28
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.33 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.34 }
			}
		}
	}

		name = Okay
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.32
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }

				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}

			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.33
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = { trait = staff_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I

				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.34
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.35 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.35
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.36
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.37 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.38 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.39 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.37
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = short_sword_I 
					trait = short_sword_III
					trait = short_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = short_sword_II 
					trait = short_sword_I
					trait = short_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = short_sword_II 
					trait = short_sword_III
					trait = short_sword_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = spear_III
					trait = spear_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }

			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = spear_III
					trait = spear_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = spear_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = spear_II 
					trait = spear_I
					trait = spear_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = spear_II 
					trait = spear_III
					trait = spear_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
			
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.38
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = lance_II 
					trait = lance_III
					trait = lance_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

					trait = lance_IV
				}

				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

					trait = lance_IV

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.39
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_III 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_III
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_III
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_III
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_III
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_III
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_III
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.40 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.40
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.41 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}	

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.41
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = knights_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV

					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.42
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.43
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.44 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.44
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.45
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.46 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III

				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior

				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier

				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.47 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.47
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {

					trait = armoury_IV
				}

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.49
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.50 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.50
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I

				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}

			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II

					trait = law_II

			}

				add_trait = politics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.52 }

		name = Okay 
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.52
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.53
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

			75 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_II }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_I
				}
			}
		}

	}

		name = Okay
	}

				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_II 
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			10 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.58
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
			
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.59 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = administration_II 
					trait = administration_III
					trait = administration_IV
				}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_III
					trait = administration_IV

					trait = administration_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.61
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
			
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = accounting_II

					trait = finance_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.62
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}

					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III

				}
			}

				NOT = {

					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.63
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.64
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = connoisseur_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = connoisseur_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = dancing_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = dancing_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fire_eating_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fire_eating_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = musician_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = musician_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = musician_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poet_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poet_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poet_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I 
				}
			}
		}

	id = TOSDTG.65
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_I

				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
					trait = savoir_faire_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
					trait = savoir_faire_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.69
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV				
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.74 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			4 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.75
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.76
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			7 = {

				}

				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.79 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.80
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
					trait = counterfeiting_III
					trait = counterfeiting_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II

				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II

			}

					trait = forgery_IV

					trait = throwing_III

			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {

				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.81
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.82
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I 
				}
			}
		}

				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = falconer_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_I
					trait = falconer_II
					trait = falconer_III
					trait = falconer_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = herbalism_I
					trait = herbalism_II
					trait = herbalism_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = herbalism_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = herbalism_I
					trait = herbalism_II
					trait = herbalism_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_III
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I
					trait = physician_III
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.103 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.104
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			11 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = astronomy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = geology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = geography_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			11 = {
				add_trait = physics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.105
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

			6 = {

	id = TOSDTG.106
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II

					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II

			}

	id = TOSDTG.107
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.108
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.109
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
