character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.110
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.111
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.112 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.112
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.120 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.118
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.119 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.120
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 3 }

			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.121
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = athletics_I
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = athletics_II
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}				
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.138 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = athletics_III
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.139 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = athletics_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.141 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = { trait = manouvering_I }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_II }
			}

				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_I }

		random_list = {
			27 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = manouvering_I
					trait = manouvering_II
					trait = manouvering_III
					trait = manouvering_IV
				}
			}
			10 = { 
				add_trait = manouvering_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = manouvering_I
					trait = manouvering_II
					trait = manouvering_III
					trait = manouvering_IV
				}
			
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = manouvering_I
					trait = manouvering_II
					trait = manouvering_III
					trait = manouvering_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = manouvering_I
					trait = manouvering_II
					trait = manouvering_III
					trait = manouvering_IV
				}
			}
			27 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = combat_arts_I
					trait = combat_arts_II
					trait = combat_arts_III
					trait = combat_arts_IV
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = combat_arts_I
					trait = combat_arts_II
					trait = combat_arts_III
					trait = combat_arts_IV
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = combat_arts_I
					trait = combat_arts_II
					trait = combat_arts_III
					trait = combat_arts_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = combat_arts_I
					trait = combat_arts_II
					trait = combat_arts_III
					trait = combat_arts_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.143
	
	hide_window = yes 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.144 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.145 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.146 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.144
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.148
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
			
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.149
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300

			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			7 = {

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
		}
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.150
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			12 = {

					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }

			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }

			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.151 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.151
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			33 = {

			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.154 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.155 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.153
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.156 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_I 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.156 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_I 
					trait = axe_II
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.156 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = axe_I
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }

	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.155
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.156 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.156
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			12 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			12 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			10 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.157 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II

					year = 1350

				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		}

	id = TOSDTG.158

			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}

				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }

		name = Okay
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.159
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.160 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.160
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.161
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = ambush_III

					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}

					trait = siege_engines_II

				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.162 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.162
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II

					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III

					trait = military_tactics_I

					trait = military_tactics_I

			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I

					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II

					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.163 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.163
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = armoury_II

					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}

					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {

				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II

					trait = ambush_IV
				}

				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II

					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist

				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }

	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.164
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.165
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.166 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.166
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}

		name = Okay 
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.167
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.168
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.169 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}

	id = TOSDTG.169
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.171
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			75 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_II }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.172
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			45 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_II 
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			10 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}

				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}

	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.174
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
			
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.175 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.175
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
					trait = finance_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
					trait = finance_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.176
	
	hide_window = yes

			5 = {

					trait = finance_IV

			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk

					trait = thrifty_clerk

				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.177 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.177
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV

			5 = {

			}

					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.181
	
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {

			6 = {

					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.185
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.186
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		random_list = {
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {

			}
			8 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {

	id = TOSDTG.188
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
			
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II

			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV					
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II

				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II

				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.189
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.190
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II

					trait = fast_talk_IV

			}

				add_trait = forced_entry_II

				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II

					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I

				}

			4 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV				
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III

				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II

					trait = smuggling_IV
				}

			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II

					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.191
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.192
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.193 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.193
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II

			}

					trait = counterfeiting_II

					trait = forgery_II

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.194
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}

					trait = assassination_III

				NOT = {

					trait = flamboyant_schemer

			}
		}

		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.195
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

					trait = counterfeiting_II

	id = TOSDTG.196
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II

				NOT = {

			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = architecture_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = architecture_II
					trait = architecture_III
					trait = architecture_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = architecture_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = architecture_I
					trait = architecture_III
					trait = architecture_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = architecture_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = architecture_I
					trait = architecture_II
					trait = architecture_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = architecture_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = architecture_I
					trait = architecture_II
					trait = architecture_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = engineering_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = engineering_II
					trait = engineering_III
					trait = engineering_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = engineering_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = engineering_I
					trait = engineering_III
					trait = engineering_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = engineering_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = engineering_I
					trait = engineering_II
					trait = engineering_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = engineering_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = engineering_I
					trait = engineering_II
					trait = engineering_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.214 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.222
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II 
				}
			}

					trait = geology_II

				add_trait = geography_I

				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.223
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.224
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}

				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.225
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

					trait = protective_alchemy_I

				add_trait = archaelogy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_II
					trait = archaelogy_III
					trait = archaelogy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_II
					trait = archaelogy_III
					trait = archaelogy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.226
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.236 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.234
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.235 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
