character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.236
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
		5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.237 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.238 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.239 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.240 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.241 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.242 }
			}

	id = TOSDTG.252
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = learning_scholarly_I
				NOT = {
					trait = learning_scholarly_II
					trait = learning_scholarly_III
					trait = learning_scholarly_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = learning_scholarly_II
				NOT = {
					trait = learning_scholarly_I
					trait = learning_scholarly_III
					trait = learning_scholarly_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.342 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = learning_scholarly_III
				NOT = {
					trait = learning_scholarly_I
					trait = learning_scholarly_II
					trait = learning_scholarly_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.343 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = learning_scholarly_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = learning_scholarly_I
					trait = learning_scholarly_II
					trait = learning_scholarly_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.345 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = { trait = manouvering_I }
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_II }
			}
			15 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_I }
			}
		}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.259
	
	hide_window = yes 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.260 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.261 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.262 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.260
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = { year = 1300 }

				add_trait = staff_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			25 = {

					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {

					culture = english 
				}

			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }

		name = Okay
	}

			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.265 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.266 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.264
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
			
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.265
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.266
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.267 }
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.267
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.268
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.269 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.270 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.271 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.269
	
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {

		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}

				add_trait = axe_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.270
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = lance_II 
					trait = lance_III
					trait = lance_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

					year = 1300

					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV

			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV
				}

				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

					year = 1300

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.271
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {

					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I

				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.272 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_III 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I

				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.272
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.273 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}	

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.273
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = knights_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = round_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = buckler_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = targe_I
				OR = {
					culture = scottish
					culture = frankish
					culture = norse
				}
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = scutum_I
				culture = roman
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = aspis_I
				culture = greek
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
	
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.274
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.275
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.276 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.276
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.277
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.278 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.278
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				}
			}

					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.279 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.279
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV

				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I

					trait = siege_engines_I

				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician

				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier

				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician

			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician

				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier

				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}

		name = Okay

	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {

			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}

				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.281
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.282 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

				NOT = {

					trait = diplomacy_II

					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III

				NOT = {

					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {

					trait = underhanded_rogue

				}
			}
		}

		name = Okay 
	}

					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.285 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.285
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III

				NOT = {

					trait = diplomacy_II

				NOT = {

					trait = fortune_builder

				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
				}
			}
		}

					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fortune_builder
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.294 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.294
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.295
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.296
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				}
			}

				NOT = {

				}
			}

				NOT = {

				}
			}

				NOT = {

					trait = poet_I
					trait = poet_II
					trait = poet_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poet_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poet_I
					trait = poet_II
					trait = poet_III
				}
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_II
					trait = savoir_faire_III
					trait = savoir_faire_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I
					trait = savoir_faire_III
					trait = savoir_faire_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I
					trait = savoir_faire_II
					trait = savoir_faire_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I
					trait = savoir_faire_II
					trait = savoir_faire_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_II
					trait = singer_III
					trait = singer_IV
				}

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I

character_event = {

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I

				NOT = {

					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.300
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.301
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.302
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I

			}

				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_II

			}
			8 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I 
				}
			}

	option = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.303
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I 
					trait = disguise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I 
					trait = disguise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I 
					trait = fast_talk_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I 
					trait = fast_talk_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I 
					trait = observation_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I 
					trait = observation_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.304
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
			
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV					
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.305 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.305
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II

			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I

					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV				
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.306 }
	}
	
	option = {

	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.306
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}

			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV

			4 = {

			4 = {

					trait = observation_I

					trait = observation_III

					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV				
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.307
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.308
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.309 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.309
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}

				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
					trait = forgery_II

				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = forgery_II

			7 = {

					trait = poison_II

	id = TOSDTG.310
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}

					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV

					trait = stealth_III
					trait = stealth_IV

				NOT = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I
					trait = stealth_II

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV

			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.311 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.312 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.312
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV

					trait = assassination_IV

				NOT = {

					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III

					trait = counterfeiting_III

					trait = siege_engineering_II

			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.324

			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_I

			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = astronomy_I 
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = geography_II 
				}

			6 = {

				}

			6 = {

				NOT = {

				NOT = {

				}

			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
				}

	}
