character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.338
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = astronomy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = astronomy_I
					trait = astronomy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = astronomy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = astronomy_I
					trait = astronomy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II  
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.352 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.339
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_II
					trait = anthropology_III
					trait = anthropology_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_III
					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II
					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II
					trait = anthropology_III
				}
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = archaelogy_III
					trait = archaelogy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_II

				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_III
					trait = archaelogy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = archaelogy_III

				NOT = {
					trait = archaelogy_I
					trait = archaelogy_II
					trait = archaelogy_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II
					trait = geology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = geology_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II
					trait = geology_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = geography_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_II 
					trait = geography_III
					trait = geography_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = geography_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I 
					trait = geography_III
					trait = geography_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = geography_II
					trait = geography_III

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_II
					trait = mathematics_III
					trait = mathematics_IV
				}

			3 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_III
					trait = mathematics_IV
				}

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II
					trait = mathematics_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II
					trait = mathematics_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = physics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_II
					trait = physics_III
					trait = physics_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = physics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_III
					trait = physics_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = physics_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.340
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.341
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV

			}

				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II

	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {

			}
		}

	}

	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.348
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.349 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.349
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
					trait = philosophy_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
					trait = philosophy_II

			}

				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = martial_cleric

			25 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
					trait = martial_cleric

			}
		}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.350
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.351 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.352
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 1 }

			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.353 }

					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}				
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		name = Okay
	}

	id = TOSDTG.375
	
	hide_window = yes 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.376 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.377 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.378 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			14 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.380 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.381 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.382 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.380
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
			
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.381
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.382
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.383 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.383
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.384
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.385 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.386 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.387 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.385
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_I 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = axe_IV

				NOT = {

					culture_group = arabic

					trait = saber_IV
				}

			}

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				OR = {

				}

				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { 
					trait = saber_II
					trait = saber_I
					trait = saber_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = saber_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { 
					trait = saber_II 
					trait = saber_III
					trait = saber_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = short_sword_II 
					trait = short_sword_III
					trait = short_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = short_sword_I

					trait = short_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = short_sword_II 
					trait = short_sword_I
					trait = short_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = spear_II 
					trait = spear_III
					trait = spear_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }

			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.386
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {

		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.387
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_III 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I

				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_III
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_III
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_III
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I
					trait = bow_II
					trait = bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_III
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_III
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_III
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
					trait = crossbow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.388 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.388
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.389 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.389 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
			10 = {

					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			}
			10 = {

					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.389 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.389 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200

				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

			}
			3 = {

					year = 1350

				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		name = Okay
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.389
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = knights_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = round_shield_I
				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.390
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.391
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.392 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.392
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.393
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.394 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.395
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = armoury_IV
				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.396
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.397
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.398 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}

			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.400 }

		name = Okay 
	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.400
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III

				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III

			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III

				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I

			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.401
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.403
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			75 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_II }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_I
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.404
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			45 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_II 
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			10 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_III
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.406
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
			
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			10 = {

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			10 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
				}
			}
		}

		name = Okay

	id = TOSDTG.409
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			5 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = accounting_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.410
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = administration_II 
					trait = administration_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.411
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.412
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = connoisseur_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = dancing_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = dancing_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fire_eating_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fire_eating_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = musician_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = poet_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = poet_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				}

					trait = savoir_faire_I 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_II

				NOT = {

			6 = {
				add_trait = poet_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poet_I
					trait = poet_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
					trait = savoir_faire_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
					trait = savoir_faire_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = singer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I 
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.414
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
			
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = artist_III

					trait = artist_IV

			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
				}
			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = connoisseur_III

				}

	id = TOSDTG.415
	
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I

	id = TOSDTG.416
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.417
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			8 = {

				}

				NOT = {

					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV				
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.422 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.423
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.424
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			7 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I 
				}
			}

			}
			7 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
				}

				}
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = {

				}

					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.427 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.428
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III

				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II

					trait = counterfeiting_IV

			3 = {

				NOT = {

				}

			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = amateurish_plotter

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.429
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.430
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.431 }
	}

	}

			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I
					trait = warhorse_II
					trait = warhorse_III
					trait = warhorse_IV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.451 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.454
	
	hide_window = yes

			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				}

					trait = anthropology_II

	id = TOSDTG.456
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I

				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
