character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.457
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II

					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV

					trait = anthropology_III
					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}

				add_trait = anthropology_II

					trait = anthropology_I

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.458
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.459
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.460 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.460
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.461
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.462 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.462
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_II

				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.463
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.464
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.465 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.465
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
					trait = philosophy_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I 
					trait = philosophy_II  
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
					trait = martial_cleric 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
					trait = martial_cleric 
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.466
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.467 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.467
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
####Random Discipline and Trait Assignment to existing characters.
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.467
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	trigger = {
		min_age = 16
		any_playable_ruler = {
			OR = {
				culture_group = north_germanic
				culture_group = central_germanic
				culture_group = west_germanic
				culture_group = latin
				culture_group = dalmatian
				culture_group = byzantine
				culture_group = celtic
				culture_group = finno_ugric
				culture_group = baltic
				culture_group = altaic
				culture_group = arabic
				culture_group = levantine_arabic
				culture_group = east_slavic
				culture_group = west_slavic
				culture_group = south_slavic
				culture_group = magyar
				culture_group = iranian
				culture_group = east_african
				culture_group = west_african
				culture_group = mesoamerican
				culture_group = israelite
				culture_group = indo_aryan_group
				culture_group = dravidian_group
				culture_group = vasconic
			}
		}
		any_province_character = {
			OR = {
				culture_group = north_germanic
				culture_group = central_germanic
				culture_group = west_germanic
				culture_group = latin
				culture_group = dalmatian
				culture_group = byzantine
				culture_group = celtic
				culture_group = finno_ugric
				culture_group = baltic
				culture_group = altaic
				culture_group = arabic
				culture_group = levantine_arabic
				culture_group = east_slavic
				culture_group = west_slavic
				culture_group = south_slavic
				culture_group = magyar
				culture_group = iranian
				culture_group = east_african
				culture_group = west_african
				culture_group = mesoamerican
				culture_group = israelite
				culture_group = indo_aryan_group
				culture_group = dravidian_group
				culture_group = vasconic
			}
			set_character_flag = character_creation
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = character_creation }
	}
	
	weight_multiplier = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
		set_variable = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
		
	character_event = { id = TOSDTG.468 } 		
	}
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.468
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { which = discipine value = 1 }
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				}
				30 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 2 }
				}
				15 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 3 }
				}
				5 = {
					set_variable = { which = traits value = 4 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 1 }
				}
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 2 }
				}
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 3 }
				}
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 4 }
				}
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.469 }
			}
			
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }	
	
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.469
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 4 }
		
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.470 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.471 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.472 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.473 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = scholarly_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.474 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_stewardship_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.475 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = knowledge_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.476 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = criminal_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.477 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = spycraft_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.478 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = animal_handling_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.479 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = arts_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.480 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.481 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = design_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.482 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = medicine_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.483 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = sciences_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.484 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = learning_scholarly_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.485 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = theology_discipline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.486 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.470
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = athletics_I
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = athletics_II
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}				
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.487 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = athletics_III
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.488 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = athletics_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.490 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.471
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_I
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_II
					trait = weapon_arts_III 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_II
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_III 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.492 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_III
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_II 
					trait = weapon_arts_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.496 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = weapon_arts_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = weapon_arts_I
					trait = weapon_arts_II 
					trait = weapon_arts_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.501 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.487
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.488
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			35 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = manouvering_II }
			}
			15 = { 
				add_trait = manouvering_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = manouvering_I }
			}
			35 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_II }
			}
			15 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = combat_arts_I }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.489 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.489
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			35 = {
				add_trait = manouvering_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = manouvering_I 
					trait = manouvering_II 
				}
			}
			15 = { 
				add_trait = manouvering_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = manouvering_I 
					trait = manouvering_II
				}
			}
			35 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = combat_arts_I
					trait = combat_arts_II 
				}
			}
			15 = {
				add_trait = combat_arts_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = combat_arts_I 
					trait = combat_arts_II
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = {
					trait = manouvering_II
					trait = manouvering_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.492

			33 = {

				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.493 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.494 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.495 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.493
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.497
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.498
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = { 
					year = 1300

			7 = {

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {

				NOT = { trait = longsword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.499
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.500 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.500
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.501
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.502 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.503 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.504 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.502
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = axe_IV

					trait = mace_IV

	id = TOSDTG.503
	
	hide_window = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

				NOT = { 
					trait = 2h_mace_II 
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = 2h_mace_I 
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = 2h_mace_II 
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = 2h_mace_II 
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = longsword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = longsword_II 
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = longsword_I 
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }

			3 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = longsword_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = longsword_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

	}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.504
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.505 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I

					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }

			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.505
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.506 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.508
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.509 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.509
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.510
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.511 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.511
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.512 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.512
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = ambush_II

					trait = ambush_IV

					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II

					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II

					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.513
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.514
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.515 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.515
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}

				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = law_II
				}

			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
				}

			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = politics_II
				}

				NOT = {

					trait = propaganda_II
				}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
				}

				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue

					trait = propaganda_II

				NOT = {

				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.517
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}

				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

				NOT = {

				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			10 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				}
			}
			10 = {

				}
			}

				}
			}

	id = TOSDTG.524
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = administration_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
					trait = finance_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
					trait = finance_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = thrifty_clerk

				}
			}
		}

					trait = administration_III

				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = administration_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
					trait = administration_III
					trait = administration_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = economics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II
					trait = economics_III
					trait = economics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
					trait = finance_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fortune_builder
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.528
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.530
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			6 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.534
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.535
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				}

			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_II 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I 
				}
			}
			8 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I

			}
			8 = {

				}
