	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
			
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = observation_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_III
					trait = smuggling_IV					
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = smuggling_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = smuggling_I
					trait = smuggling_II
					trait = smuggling_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.538 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.538
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I

				}

				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.539
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = disguise_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I

					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = forced_entry_III

				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II

					trait = forced_entry_I

				NOT = {
					trait = observation_I
					trait = observation_II
					trait = observation_III
					trait = observation_IV

			}
			4 = {

					trait = smuggling_I

			4 = {

					trait = smuggling_II

					trait = smuggling_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = streetwise_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = streetwise_I
					trait = streetwise_II
					trait = streetwise_III
					trait = streetwise_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.540
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.541
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.542 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.542
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = {

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = intricate_webweaver

				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer

				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.544 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.544
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV

				NOT = {

					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III

			3 = {
				add_trait = forgery_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I
					trait = forgery_II
					trait = forgery_III
					trait = forgery_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = forgery_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I
					trait = forgery_II
					trait = forgery_III
					trait = forgery_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
					trait = poison_III
					trait = poison_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
					trait = poison_III
					trait = poison_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poison_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
					trait = poison_III
					trait = poison_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poison_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I
					trait = poison_II
					trait = poison_III
					trait = poison_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I
					trait = stealth_II
					trait = stealth_III
					trait = stealth_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I
					trait = stealth_II
					trait = stealth_III
					trait = stealth_IV					
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = stealth_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I
					trait = stealth_II
					trait = stealth_III
					trait = stealth_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = stealth_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I
					trait = stealth_II
					trait = stealth_III
					trait = stealth_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

	id = TOSDTG.546
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = siege_engineering_I
					trait = siege_engineering_II 
					trait = siege_engineering_III
					trait = siege_engineering_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II  
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.572
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.573
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I

					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II

				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.574
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.575
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.583
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.585 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = {
					trait = design_I
					trait = design_II
					trait = design_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.675 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = design_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = design_I
					trait = design_II
					trait = design_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.677 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

			}
			33 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.608
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.612
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.614
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I

				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.615 }
			}

				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.615
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.616
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.617 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.618 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.619 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.617

					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.618
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = lance_II 
					trait = lance_III
					trait = lance_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = lance_I 
					trait = lance_III
					trait = lance_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_III

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.619
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.620 }
			}

					culture = welsh

			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_III 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.620
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.621 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}	

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.621
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			16 = {
				add_trait = knights_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_III
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV 
					trait = battleaxe_I
					trait = battleaxe_II
					trait = battleaxe_III
					trait = battleaxe_IV
					trait = 2h_mace_I
					trait = 2h_mace_II
					trait = 2h_mace_III
					trait = 2h_mace_IV
					trait = staff_I
					trait = staff_II
					trait = staff_III
					trait = staff_IV
					trait = longsword_I
					trait = longsword_II
					trait = longsword_III
					trait = longsword_IV
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {
				add_trait = round_shield_I
				NOT = {
					
					trait = polearm_I
					trait = polearm_II
					trait = polearm_III
					trait = polearm_IV

					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II

					trait = rapier_main_gauche_IV

					trait = 2h_mace_II

					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = bow_II
					trait = crossbow_I
					trait = crossbow_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			16 = {

				NOT = {

				OR = {
					culture = scottish

				NOT = {

				NOT = {

				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.622
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.623
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.624 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.624
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.625
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.626 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.626
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.627 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.627
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II

				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}

					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.628
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.629
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.630 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.631
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}

					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV

			5 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV

			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_IV

			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
				}
			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV

			5 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.632 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.632
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {

					trait = law_II

				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV

			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV

			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III

				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II

				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = grey_eminence
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.633 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.633
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = law_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
					trait = law_III
					trait = law_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = politics_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
					trait = politics_III
					trait = politics_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
					trait = propaganda_III
					trait = propaganda_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II

				NOT = {

					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator

				}
			}
			5 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = underhanded_rogue
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
					trait = grey_eminence

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.634
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		add_trait = public_speaking_I
		subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.635
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			75 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_II }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = public_speaking_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.636
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			45 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_II 
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = public_speaking_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_III
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_IV
				}
			}
			10 = { 
				add_trait = public_speaking_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = public_speaking_I
					trait = public_speaking_II
					trait = public_speaking_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			10 = {

			5 = {

			5 = {

					trait = finance_IV
				}

			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I

			5 = {
				add_trait = finance_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I
					trait = finance_II
					trait = finance_III
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = fortune_builder
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fortune_builder
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = midas_touched
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = midas_touched
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
					trait = thrifty_clerk
					trait = fortune_builder
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.641 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.642
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II
					trait = accounting_III
					trait = accounting_IV
				}
