character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.643
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = musician_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = poet_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.645
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = connoisseur_I
					trait = connoisseur_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = connoisseur_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = connoisseur_I
					trait = connoisseur_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = dancing_I 
					trait = dancing_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = dancing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = dancing_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = fire_eating_II

				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I 
					trait = savoir_faire_II

			}
			6 = {

			}
			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.647
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II

					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.648
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II
					trait = artist_III
					trait = artist_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = artist_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = artist_I
					trait = artist_II

					trait = savoir_faire_II
					trait = savoir_faire_III
					trait = savoir_faire_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = savoir_faire_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = savoir_faire_I
					trait = savoir_faire_II
					trait = savoir_faire_III
					trait = savoir_faire_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = singer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II
					trait = singer_III
					trait = singer_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = singer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II
					trait = singer_III
					trait = singer_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = singer_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II
					trait = singer_III
					trait = singer_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = singer_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = singer_I
					trait = singer_II
					trait = singer_III
					trait = singer_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV
				}

			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_III
					trait = disguise_IV

					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = disguise_I
					trait = disguise_II
					trait = disguise_III
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = fast_talk_III

					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = fast_talk_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fast_talk_I
					trait = fast_talk_II
					trait = fast_talk_III
					trait = fast_talk_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II
					trait = forced_entry_III
					trait = forced_entry_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II

					trait = forced_entry_IV

			}

				NOT = {
					trait = forced_entry_I 
					trait = forced_entry_II

				NOT = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.655
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.656
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = poison_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poison_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = stealth_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = throwing_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I 
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.657 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.657
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = counterfeiting_II

					trait = counterfeiting_I 
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = forgery_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I 
					trait = forgery_II

			}

				add_trait = forgery_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = forgery_II

			7 = {

					trait = poison_II

					trait = flamboyant_schemer
				}
			}
			7 {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer

					trait = stealth_III

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I

					trait = throwing_IV

				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_IV
				}

			3 = {
				add_trait = throwing_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = elusive_shadow
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.659 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

				NOT = {

				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I

				NOT = {
					trait = throwing_I
					trait = throwing_II
					trait = throwing_III
					trait = throwing_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = amateurish_plotter
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}

				add_trait = flamboyant_schemer
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer

				}
			}

				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.660 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.660
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = assassination_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = assassination_I
					trait = assassination_II
					trait = assassination_III
					trait = assassination_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
					trait = counterfeiting_III
					trait = counterfeiting_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
					trait = counterfeiting_III
					trait = counterfeiting_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
					trait = counterfeiting_III
					trait = counterfeiting_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = counterfeiting_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = counterfeiting_I
					trait = counterfeiting_II 
					trait = counterfeiting_III
					trait = counterfeiting_IV

			}

				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I
					trait = forgery_II
					trait = forgery_III
					trait = forgery_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = forgery_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = forgery_I
					trait = forgery_II
					trait = forgery_III
					trait = forgery_IV
				}

				NOT = {
					trait = stealth_I

					trait = elusive_shadow
				}

			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter
					trait = flamboyant_schemer
					trait = intricate_webweaver
					trait = elusive_shadow
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = intricate_webweaver
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = amateurish_plotter

				}

				}
			}
		}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.661
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.662
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = falconer_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = falconer_I

			25 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = warhorse_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I 
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.663 }
	}

	}

					trait = falconer_II

					trait = warhorse_II

				NOT = {
					trait = warhorse_I 
					trait = warhorse_II  
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = writer_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = writer_I
					trait = writer_II
					trait = writer_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = writer_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = writer_I
					trait = writer_II
					trait = writer_III
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

					trait = metallurgy_II

				}

					trait = siege_engineering_III

					trait = siege_engineering_III

			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I 
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_III
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = physician_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physician_I 
					trait = physician_II
					trait = physician_III
					trait = physician_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			3 = {

					trait = protective_alchemy_II

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

	id = TOSDTG.688
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I

					trait = protective_alchemy_I

					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.689
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}

					trait = anthropology_III
					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = anthropology_II

					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.690
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.691
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.692 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				NOT = {

					trait = literature_II

				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
				}

	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = literature_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I
					trait = literature_II
					trait = literature_III
					trait = literature_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = teaching_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
					trait = teaching_II
					trait = teaching_III
					trait = teaching_IV
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.701 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest 
				}
			}
		}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.698
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.699 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.699
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {

					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian

				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {

					trait = detached_priest

			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.701
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = traits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = athletic_dicispline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.702 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = weapon_arts_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.703 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = military_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.704 }
			}
			5 = {
				is_variable_equal = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = business_diplomacy_discpline value = 1 }

			5 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = traits value = 1 }

			}
			5 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.702
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			45 = {
				add_trait = athletics_I
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = athletics_II
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_III
					trait = athletics_IV
				}				
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.719 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = athletics_III
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.720 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = athletics_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = athletics_I
					trait = athletics_II
					trait = athletics_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.722 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}

					trait = knowledge_IV
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = knowledge_II
				NOT = {
					trait = knowledge_I
					trait = knowledge_III
					trait = knowledge_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.760 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = knowledge_III
				NOT = {
					trait = knowledge_I
					trait = knowledge_II
					trait = knowledge_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.761 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = knowledge_IV
				NOT = {
					trait = knowledge_I
					trait = knowledge_II
					trait = knowledge_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.763 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.724
	
	hide_window = yes 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.725 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.726 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.727 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.725
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			14 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }

			14 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { year = 1300 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = staff_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

			14 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I

			}

				add_trait = longsword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

		}

}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.727
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.728
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.729 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.730 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.731 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.729
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = axe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = arming_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = dagger_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = dagger_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = saber_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				OR = {
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = arabic 
					culture_group = east_slavic
					culture_group = iranian 
					culture = mizrahi 
					culture = bulgarian
				}
				NOT = { trait = saber_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = short_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = short_sword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = spear_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = spear_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
			
character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.730
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }			
			
		random_list = {			
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = lance_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = lance_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = polearm_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = polearm_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = rapier_main_gauche_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					year = 1300
					trait = rapier_main_gauche_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = staff_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = staff_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = battleaxe_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = battleaxe_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = 2h_mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = 2h_mace_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_II }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = longsword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = longsword_I }
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.731
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = bow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_II 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = crossbow_II
				NOT = {
					trait = crossbow_I 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.732 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.732
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.733
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
	
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.734 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.735 }
			}
			33 = {
				set_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.736 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.734
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_I 
					trait = axe_III
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = axe_I 
					trait = axe_II
					trait = axe_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = axe_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = axe_I
					trait = axe_II 
					trait = axe_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = mace_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = mace_II 
					trait = mace_III
					trait = mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = mace_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = mace_I 
					trait = mace_III
					trait = mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = mace_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = mace_II 
					trait = mace_I
					trait = mace_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = mace_IV 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mace_I
					trait = mace_II 
					trait = mace_III 
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = arming_sword_II
					trait = arming_sword_III
					trait = arming_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = arming_sword_I 
					trait = arming_sword_III
					trait = arming_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = arming_sword_II 
					trait = arming_sword_I
					trait = arming_sword_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = arming_sword_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = one_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = arming_sword_II
					trait = arming_sword_III
					trait = arming_sword_I
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 2 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.735
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = lance_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = two_handed_weapons value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = lance_II 
					trait = lance_III
					trait = lance_IV

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.736
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_I
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_II 
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_II
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_III
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_III
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = horse_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = mongolian
					culture = turkish 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = horse_bow_I
					trait = horse_bow_II
					trait = horse_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_I 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_III
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_III 
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_IV
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = long_bow_IV
				OR = {
					culture = welsh
					culture = english 
				}
				NOT = {
					trait = long_bow_I
					trait = long_bow_II
					trait = long_bow_III
				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = ranged_weapons value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.737 }
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = bow_I
				NOT = {
					trait = bow_II

				}
				set_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.737
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		is_variable_equal = { which = armour value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = cloth_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = cloth_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = leather_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = leather_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_I
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_II 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = mail_armour_II
				NOT = {
					trait = mail_armour_I 
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_I
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = halfplate_II
				NOT = {
					year = 1200
					trait = halfplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_I 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_II
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = fullplate_II 
				NOT = {
					year = 1350
					trait = fullplate_I
				}
				subtract_variable = { which = armour value = 1 }
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				character_event = { id = TOSDTG.738 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.739

			14 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			14 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}

		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.740
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = armoury_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = ambush_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = military_tactics_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = leadership_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_II }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = siege_engines_I }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = tough_soldier }
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { trait = misguided_warrior }
			}
		}
		
			character_event = { id = TOSDTG.741 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.741
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II
					}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II				
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = ambush_II 
				}

				add_trait = ambush_II

				add_trait = leadership_I

					trait = leadership_II

					trait = siege_engines_II

			7 = {

				NOT = {

					trait = tough_soldier 
				}
			}
			7 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier

		}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.742
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }
	
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I 
					trait = armoury_II
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I 
					trait = ambush_II
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I				
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I 
					trait = military_II
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I 
					trait = leadership_II
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior
					trait = tough_soldier
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.743 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.743
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}

				NOT = {

				}

				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I

				}

				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.744 }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.744
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait armoury_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = armoury_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = armoury_I
					trait = armoury_II 
					trait = armoury_III
					trait = armoury_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = ambush_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = ambush_I
					trait = ambush_II 
					trait = ambush_III
					trait = ambush_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_I

				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_III 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = military_tactics_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = military_tactics_I
					trait = military_tactics_II
					trait = military_tactics_III
					trait = military_tactics_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = leadership_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = leadership_I
					trait = leadership_II 
					trait = leadership_III
					trait = leadership_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = siege_engines_I 
					trait = siege_engines_II
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = siege_engines_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = siege_engines_I
					trait = siege_engines_II 
					trait = siege_engines_III
					trait = siege_engines_IV
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = misguided_warrior
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = tough_soldier
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = { 
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = skilled_tactician 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
			4 = {
				add_trait = brilliant_strategist
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = misguided_warrior 
					trait = tough_soldier 
					trait = skilled_tactician
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.745
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			20 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.746
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.747 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay 
	}
}

	id = TOSDTG.747
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = law_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = law_I
					trait = law_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = politics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = politics_I
					trait = politics_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = propaganda_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = propaganda_I
					trait = propaganda_II
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = naive_appeaser
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = underhanded_rogue
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = naive_appeaser
					trait = underhanded_rogue
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.817 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = Okay

	id = TOSDTG.749
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I

				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}

	id = TOSDTG.750
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
	
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II
					trait = diplomacy_III
					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = diplomacy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = diplomacy_I
					trait = diplomacy_II

					trait = diplomacy_IV
				}
			}

			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = thrifty_clerk
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = thrifty_clerk
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = indulgent_wastrel
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.756 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.756
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = accounting_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = accounting_I
					trait = accounting_II 
				}
			}

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }

					trait = administration_II

				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = administration_I
					trait = administration_II 
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = economics_I
					trait = economics_II 
				}

			10 = {
				add_trait = economics_II 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {

					trait = economics_II 
				}

			10 = {
				add_trait = finance_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = finance_I 
					trait = finance_II 
				}

	id = TOSDTG.761
	
	hide_window = yes

		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }

			6 = {

				NOT = {

				}

			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = fire_eating_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = fire_eating_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
