			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geology_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geology_I
					trait = geology_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = geography_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = geography_I
					trait = geography_II  
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = mathematics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = mathematics_I
					trait = mathematics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
			6 = {
				add_trait = physics_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = physics_I
					trait = physics_II 
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
		
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.920
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 3 }

		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.921
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
				
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV

					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {

				NOT = {
					trait = anthropology_I
					trait = anthropology_II

					trait = anthropology_IV
				}
			}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.922
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = protective_alchemy_I 
					trait = protective_alchemy_II
					trait = protective_alchemy_III
					trait = protective_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_IV
				}
			}
			3 = {
				add_trait = poisonous_alchemy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_I 
					trait = poisonous_alchemy_II

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.923
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
			50 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.924
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_II 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = literature_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = literature_I 
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_I
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_II
				}
			}
			25 = {
				add_trait = teaching_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = teaching_I
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.925 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = TOSDTG.931
	
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		is_variable_equal = { which = subtraits value = 2 }
		
		random_list = {
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_I 
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_II
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_III
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_III
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_IV
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = philosophy_IV
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = philosophy_I
					trait = philosophy_II
					trait = philosophy_III
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = detached_priest
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = detached_priest
				}
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = TOSDTG.932 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}

			12 = {
				add_trait = martial_cleric
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = scholarly_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
			12 = {
				add_trait = mastermind_theologian
				subtract_variable = { which = subtraits value = 1 }
				NOT = {
					trait = detached_priest
					trait = martial_cleric
					trait = scholarly_theologian
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = Okay
	}
}
